summary:
bright cloudy eyes humans and elves - standalone
Inspired by Hellosanta <3
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]Note to anyone who uploaded version 1.3 as soon as it was posted. It was missing some meshes. The 1.3 files are now complete. Please update your version![/color]


I was inspired by Hellosanta\'s eye textures they used in a couple images they posted and decided to try to make some of my own. These are the finished product. They are brightly colored to resemble gemstones and have that cloudy eye look that I adore. Probably not for everyone but I like how they came out. Let me know what you think!

This is standalone. These textures do NOT replace any of the vanilla textures. Promises. ^_^

[color=red]This mod comes with an optional glowing vampire cloudy eye. If you would like the eyes of humanoid (human, elf, orc) vampires to be replaced with the cloudy eye, please download the optional file after downloading the main file. THIS DOES NOT REQUIRE DAWNGUARD![/color]



FUTURE UPDATES:
cloudy eyes for orcs
select npc\'s altered to wear cloudy eyes (if anyone has any suggestions about who would be good to have this feature, I\'m all ears 8D )

[center][b]POSSIBLE NPCS FOR CLOUDY EYES[/b]
+ Isran
+ Dark Brotherhood Members[/center]



UDATES:

Version 1.3
-- cloudy versions of all elf eyes altered and updated.
-- full set of demonic eyes added.
-- several heterochromia eye sets added.
-- glowing vampire eyes added.

Version 1.2
-- cloudy versions of vanilla dark elf eyes added  
-- cloudy versions of vanilla wood elf eyes added  
-- cloudy versions of vanilla high elf eyes added  
-- lavender, fiery, silvery hazel, and red added for humans  

Version 1.1 
-- added cloudy eyes for male humans.
author: Arcadian Phoenix
